mapper.select: select exists (select * from information_schema.tables where table_schema='rsss' and table_name='download_list')
select id, created, status, planid as planId, path, title, machine from rsss."download_list" where id=#{id}

select id, created, status, planid as planId, path, title, machine from rsss."download_list" where
id=#{id} and
status=#{status} and
1=1

select id, created, status, planid as planId, path, title, machine from rsss."download_list" where planid = #{planId} order by id desc
limit #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into rsss."download_list" ( created, status, planid, path, title, machine ) values ( #{created}, #{status}, #{planId}, #{path}, #{title}, #{machine} )
